title: Green Chile Beef Tacos
ingredients: 2 cups beef broth, or more if needed
method: Step 1: Lay beef chuck roast into the bottom of a slow cooker with a tight-fitting lid. Sprinkle taco seasoning mix over beef. Pour green salsa over the top, followed by broth.
Step 2: Cook on Low for 4 hours. Add more broth if needed. Remove beef from the slow cooker and shred with 2 forks. Return shredded beef to the slow cooker; mix with liquid. Serve hot.
